      public Object getHeaderValue()
      Specified by:
      getHeaderValue in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      a header value that a column may hold.

    • getLabel

      public Label getLabel()
      Specified by:
      getLabel in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      the label (icon and text) to use if the column header is displayed on the screen.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Specified by:
      getName in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      the name of the column (which is the text defined in label)

    • getType

      public Type getType()
      Specified by:
      getType in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      The expected type for the column values (for all rows).

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Specified by:
      getRole in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      a specific role that this column is playing (ex: if the column contains the css class to apply to the row in a table, or the series names in a chart using the column format, ...). Should be null if the column has the default role for the visual component it is used for (the default role usually means the column contains domain data).

    • getStyle

      public VisualStyle getStyle()
      Specified by:
      getStyle in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      The style information to apply when rendering this column.

    • getValueRenderer

      public ValueRenderer getValueRenderer()
      Specified by:
      getValueRenderer in interface VisualColumn
      Returns:
      The value renderer to be used for this column to transform the cell values into graphical nodes.
